feature_list_title: One platform for all your Events
feature_list_text: Imagine your online event with an UNLIMITED number of active participants, stands and booths from anywhere in the world without any restraints by space or number!
feature_list_essential_multilingual_text: Translate your content to your international user base. Have the attendees read infortmaion in their language.
feature_list_powerful_customisations_tex: Create your own event with it's own identity. Logos, colour schemes, custom registration fields, permission restrictions are just a few features we offer
feature_list_content_creation_text: It is always nice to have more content present on the event, like articles, downloadables and others.
feature_list_event_explore_and_manage_te: The platform offers a number of features for the user not to get bored. Let your attendees indulge themselves at the virtual event.
feature_list_event_explore_and_manage_se: Set up meetings with stand owners
To find out more about the exhibitor/stand, the attendee can setup a meeting with their staff.
unlimited_booths_stands_title: Unlimited number of booths/stands on the event
unlimited_booths_stands_text: Invite exhibitors without a space limit. Let attendees find more useful companies.
